actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make the low-income housing credit permanent and to facilitate the rehabilitation of public housing using such credit.

summary.text: Public Housing Rehabilitation Equity Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make the low-income housing credit permanent. Makes such housing credit available for rehabilitation of public housing.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make the low-income housing credit permanent and to facilitate the rehabilitation of public housing using such credit.
